mapper.delete: DELETE FROM USER_T WHERE CURRENT_DATE - WITHDRAWAL_DT >= 1
mapper.select: SELECT A.BOARD_NO, A.BOARD_TITLE, A.BOARD_CONTENT, A.BOARD_HIT, A.BOARD_CREATE_DT, A.USER_NAME, A.USER_NO FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO DESC) AS RN , B.BOARD_NO , B.BOARD_TITLE , B.BOARD_HIT , B.BOARD_CONTENT , B.BOARD_CREATE_DT , B.USER_NO , U.USER_NAME FROM BOARD_T B INNER JOIN USER_T U ON B.USER_NO = U.USER_NO WHERE B.USER_NO = ${userNo}) A WHERE RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}

SELECT A.BOARD_NO, A.BOARD_TITLE, A.BOARD_CONTENT, A.BOARD_CREATE_DT, A.USER_NAME, A.USER_NO, A.CMT_NO, A.CMT_CONTENT, A.CMT_CREATE_DT FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO DESC) AS RN , B.BOARD_NO, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_CONTENT, B.BOARD_CREATE_DT , U.USER_NAME, C.USER_NO, C.CMT_NO, C.CMT_CONTENT, C.CMT_CREATE_DT FROM BOARD_T B INNER JOIN USER_T U ON B.USER_NO = U.USER_NO INNER JOIN COMMENT_T C ON B.BOARD_NO = C.BOARD_NO WHERE B.USER_NO = ${userNo}) A WHERE RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
